Record.ClassificationPath: Male Urogenital Diseases/Genital Diseases, Male/Infertility/Infertility, Male/Sertoli Cell-Only Syndrome
Record.Description: A type of male infertility in which no germ cells are visible in any of the biopsied SEMINIFEROUS TUBULES (type I) or in which germ cells are present in a minority of tubules (type II). Clinical features include AZOOSPERMIA, normal VIRILIZATION, and normal chromosomal complement.
